3. Please submit an updated version of the DMP once SMEC approval for the new data collection has been obtained. This can be submitted as 'Intermediate DMP'.

6.2. You could consider preservation on KU Leuven RDR (research data repository) and then restrict access to your research group only:  https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr That way the corpus of interviews is preserved as an authentic master version with all documentation included.
